content: Now turn back the other way and continue up the valley. At the top of the path, you'll come to another archway and the start of Rakshasa Palace.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
Now turn back the other way and continue up the valley. At the top of the path, you'll come to another archway and the start of Rakshasa Palace.
